modShortDescription: This mod adds a Repeater Crossbow to the game. It requires the Crossbow to be unlocked before it can be crafted. Compatible with A18.1 Stable.
modDescription:
This mod adds a Repeater Crossbow to the game. It requires the Crossbow to be unlocked before it can be crafted. Compatible with A18.1 Stable. Not compatible with 18.2 b5.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1DQQaz3cazSsbF9kZcmahdGkaS7KSYRGL)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15790-gg2015s-collection-of-a18-modlets/).

**Credits:** [GG2015](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gg2015/)
